titleStmt.title: One of the foure sermons preached before the Kings Maiestie, at Hampton Court in September last This concerning the antiquitie and superioritie of bishops. Sept. 21. 1606. By the Reuerend Father in God William Lord Bishop of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, William, d. 1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by I. W[indet] for Matthew Law,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
